headline: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) Unveils Affordable MPLAB PICkit Basic Debugger At US$30 Enhancing Developer Tools
summary: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) recently launched the MPLAB PICkit Basic in-circuit debugger, positioning itself as an effective solution for engineers' needs, contributing to a 14% rise in share price over the last month. This increase occurred despite the broader market decline of 1.9% due to tech stock sell-offs linked to tariff uncertainties. While the company faced a challenging Q3 with a reported net loss and a forecasted reduction in Q4 sales, strategic product launches, such as...
